title: Better work methods. Pt. 2: Brushing burrs from studs
brief_description: Illustrates original and then improved methods for (1) brushing burrs from studs; (2) assembling rope clips; (3) fundamental hand motions used in signing a letter; (4) pin board study; (5) bolt and washer assembly.
